name: everyrow-mcp
description: AI-powered dataframe ops: transform, dedupe, merge, rank, and screen with natural language
long_description: MCP server for everyrow: agent ops at spreadsheet scale. This server exposes everyrow's 5 core operations as MCP tools, allowing LLM applications to screen, rank, dedupe, merge, and run agents on CSV files. All tools operate on local CSV files.

tools.name: everyrow_screen
tools.description: Filter CSV rows based on criteria that require judgment

tools.name: everyrow_rank
tools.description: Score and sort CSV rows based on qualitative criteria

tools.name: everyrow_dedupe
tools.description: Remove duplicate rows using semantic equivalence

tools.name: everyrow_merge
tools.description: Join two CSV files using intelligent entity matching

tools.name: everyrow_agent
tools.description: Run web research agents on each row of a CSV

api_key.title: Everyrow API Key
api_key.description: Your API key from https://everyrow.io/api-key ($20 free credit)
